item.title: Last Of Us Season Premiere Punctures The Obnoxious Girlboss Trope
item.description: The new season of 'The Last of Us' doesn’t coddle or lionize teenage girls but instead depicts them in all their obnoxious glory.

item.title: Good Friday Reminds Us Death Isn’t Normal
item.description: As you gaze upon the cross of Christ today, take heart that the death we were never designed to experience has been ultimately defeated.
